overview: Seven is our lucky number - and you'd better believe we got lucky with it. By popular demand, Filthy's First Taste is at it again with a seventh volume of fresh nymphos aching to make it for the sake of stardom. Na√Øve looks often hide luscious libidos, and given the chance to break out of their shells, these girls will do anything to beat each other to the limelight. Bust out with them and release those nasty cravings one by one - or two at a time!
tagline: The First Taste Is Always The Sweetest!
title: Filthy's First Taste 7
